document_data.mainbody:
Wizards Way was a small road located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the mid-14 century DR.
Wizards Way was found within northwest Zhentil Keep in the Common Quarter. It ran from the wall separating the Inner Quarter from the Common Quarter in the south to Zhentil Keeps main exterior wall and Border Street in the north. Wizards Way was crossed by Warrior Street, Fortress Street, and the Street of Delights along the way.
The lavish Silver Trumpet Inn was located at the southern end of Wizards Way.
